law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] No officer or board shall insure any property of the commonwealth without special authority of law. Chapter 29: Insurance [ Text of section as recodified by 2012, 165, Sec. 112 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] No officer or board shall insure any property of the commonwealth without special authority of law.
